title: Shopping and Services 1
sentences: How much does this red t-shirt cost?
I have to go to the supermarket because the fridge is empty.
Do you accept card payments or only cash?
un regalo para el cumpleaños de mi madre.
I need to buy a gift for my mother's birthday.
This store has very good prices.
Where is the fitting room to try on this jacket?
I'm going to the checkout to pay for my things.
I want to return these pants because they are small.
Always keep the receipt just in case.
There is a long line at the butcher shop today.
Can you give me a plastic bag, please?
This store is on sale and everything is cheaper.
me ayudó a encontrar mi talla.
The shop assistant helped me find my size.
I'm looking for a shoe store to buy some new boots.
tiene unas naranjas muy frescas hoy.
The fruit shop has some very fresh oranges today.
What is the store's opening hours?
I don't have much money in my wallet right now.
Will you give me the change in one-euro coins?
de ropa es muy famosa en esta ciudad.
That clothing store is very famous in this city.
Do you have this shirt in a larger size?
This offer is free if you buy two units.
estos zapatos por otros más cómodos.
I need to exchange these shoes for more comfortable ones.
dictionary:
Cuesta / Costar - To cost
El supermercado - The supermarket
La tarjeta - The card
Comprar - To buy
El precio - The price
El probador - The fitting room
La caja - The checkout / box
Devolver - To return
El ticket - The receipt
La cola - The line / queue
La bolsa - The bag
Las rebajas - The sales
El vendedor - The shop assistant
La zapatería - The shoe store
La frutería - The fruit shop
El horario - The schedule
El dinero - The money
El cambio - The change
La tienda - The shop / store
La talla - The size
El cliente - The customer
Mirar - To look
El pasillo - The aisle
Gratis - Free
Cambiar - To exchange
